I don't see wraith strike listed when I use rawr to compare main hand weapons

guessing this is because it is a caster fist weapon?
nvm, I edited the item and set it as a dagger and now it shows up in the compare list.
You're the second person to bring that up.  Yes, since there were no caster fist weapons before, at least the Rawr.Moonkin model didn't put them in.  It will be in the next release.
ye, I was the first one :P
